contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = ''Xylocampa areola'' | image = Xylocampa areola.jpg | image_width = 240px | image_caption = | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Arthropod]]a | classis = [[Insect]]a | ordo = [[Lepidoptera]] | familia = [[Noctuidae]] | genus = ''[[Xylocampa]]'' | species = '''''X. areola''''' | binomial = ''Xylocampa areola'' | binomial_authority = [[Eugen Johann Christoph Esper|Esper]], 1789 | synonyms = }} The '''Early Grey''' ''(Xylocampa areola)'' is a species of [[moth]] of the family [[Noctuidae]]. It is found in [[Europe]] and [[Morocco]]. The [[wingspan]] is 32–40 mm. The moth flies from February to May depending on the location. The larvae feed on [[Honeysuckle]].<ref>{{cite web|url= http://www.nhm.ac.uk/research-curation/research/projects/hostplants/ |title= Robinson, G. S., P. R. Ackery, I. J. Kitching, G. W. Beccaloni & L. M. Hernández, 2010. HOSTS - A Database of the World's Lepidopteran Hostplants. Natural History Museum, London.}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.lepiforum.de/cgi-bin/lepiwiki.pl?Xylocampa_Areola Lepiforum] *[http://www.vlindernet.nl/vlindersoort.php?vlinderid=667 Vlindernet {{nl}}] *[http://webh01.ua.ac.be/vve/Checklists/Lepidoptera/Noctuidae/Xareola.htm Lepidoptera of Belgium] *[http://ukmoths.org.uk/show.php?id=3393 Early Grey at UKmoths] *[http://www.nic.funet.fi/pub/sci/bio/life/insecta/lepidoptera/ditrysia/noctuoidea/noctuidae/cuculliinae/xylocampa/index.html Funet] Taxonomy {{commons|Xylocampa areola}} [[Category:Cuculliinae]] {{Cuculliinae-stub}}
